grade_comment:
Grade: 85

Comment: The student has provided a comprehensive and well-researched understanding of the biblical definition of an angel and their primary roles according to the Bible. They have successfully highlighted the key aspects of angels as messengers, servants, created and spiritual beings, while also noting their roles in communication, intercession, protection, and preparation in the biblical narrative. Overall, the student has demonstrated a solid grasp of the biblical portrayal of angels and their significance within Christian theology.
